00045 class SessionHandler : public SessionCallback {
00046 public:
00047   virtual void jeopardy() { cout << "SESSION CALLBACK: Jeopardy" << endl; }
00048   virtual void safe() { cout << "SESSION CALLBACK: Safe" << endl; }
00049   virtual void expired() { cout << "SESSION CALLBACK: Expired" << endl; }
00050 };
00051 
00052 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00053   typedef Cons<HyperspaceCommandShellPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> MyPolicy;
00054 
00055 
00056   try {
00057     Comm *comm;
00058     CommandInterpreterPtr interp;
00059     CommandShellPtr shell;
00060     SessionPtr session_ptr;
00061     SessionHandler session_handler;
00062 
00063     init_with_policy<MyPolicy>(argc, argv);
00064     HsClientState::exit_status = 0;
00065     comm = Comm::instance();
00066 
00067     session_ptr = new Hyperspace::Session(comm, properties, &session_handler);
00068 
00069     interp = session_ptr->create_hs_interpreter();
00070     shell = new CommandShell("hyperspace", interp, properties);
00071     interp->set_silent(shell->silent());
00072     interp->set_test_mode(shell->test_mode());
00073 
00074 
00075     if(!session_ptr->wait_for_connection(30000)) {
00076       cerr << "Unable to establish connection with Hyperspace, exitting..."
00077            << endl;
00078       exit(1);
00079     }
00080 
00081     HsClientState::exit_status = shell->run();
00082     return HsClientState::exit_status;
00083   }
00084   catch(Exception &e) {
00085     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00086     return 1;
00087   }
00088   return 0;
00089 }
